Text: Exellent torrent!!, Love this game. I use game pad with xpadder and this game feels better than the PS2 version, no bugs, 10/10 thx tim.
I run Killswitch.exe and nothing happens? I tried running in compatability modes and as administrator.
I can't pass from level 4 or so. The game crashes and screen goes black. Dunno what's the problem.

Me too @kornspel. At level four: "Think Like A Gun", screen goes black and level isn't load. I thought it was a occasionally bug so I tried again with a new save game, unfortunately same thing happened.

IMPORTANT!!!
To play the next levels I figured, that u have to delete the folder named "movie" , located in the "LEVELS" folder witch is inside the game directory. Don't worry, is not that important and WORKED FINE for me.
Enjoy the next levels!
@ marx1092 Thanks man it worked for me either.
